extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
extracted_playbook.description: Enable MFA for every account, including privileged accounts, remote access systems, SaaS solutions, and corporate communications platforms.

extracted_playbook.title: Keep Software Up to Date
extracted_playbook.description: Update all software as soon as patches are available. Prioritize patches for CVEs known to be exploited if immediate updates are not possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) Tools
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy EDR tools to gain visibility into the security status of endpoints and defend against threat actors.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is Microsoft Defender for Endpoint or Microsoft 365 Defense in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Use Attack Surface Reduction Rules
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to Microsoft guidelines to use attack surface reduction rules to prevent malware infection.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Centralized Log Management
extracted_playbook.description: Forward logs from local hosts to a centralized log management server (SIEM tool) and ensure logs are searchable and correlated from multiple sources.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Signatures to Detect/Block Cobalt Strike
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy signatures to detect and/or block inbound connections from Cobalt Strike servers and other post-exploitation tools.

extracted_playbook.title: Prevent Unauthorized Execution of Macro Scripts
extracted_playbook.description: Disable macro scripts from Microsoft Office files transmitted via email and consider using Office Viewer software.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure and Maintain User and Administrative Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Use strong account management policies, dedicated workstations for administrative accounts, limit access, use strong passwords, and manage default and unused accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement User Training Program for Spearphishing
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct user training and simulated attacks to discourage users from visiting malicious websites or opening malicious attachments.
